submit_rating: Do you want to submit the rating?
encourage_rating: Modify rating by clicking on the emoticons!
rating_appreciated: Thank you! A step closer to improving Sri Lanka
add_place_banner: Zoom in on a location and click to add a new place

legend.rating: Redder the marker is, lower the chance to get the essential. Green means easily obtainable
legend.faded: A solid outline means the place was updated recently. Faded outline means outdated
legend.click: Press on a marker to view more details about the place
legend.add: Press anywhere on the map to add a new place
